    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      protected void draw()
      Main draw loop method that draws either the 2D/3D map based off of variables, or draws nothing if the title screen is currently shown
      private void draw2D(java.awt.Graphics g, Actor actor)
      Draws the 2D map onto the BufferedImage's graphics object
      private void draw3D(java.awt.Graphics g, Actor actor)
      Draws the 3D world for the player onto the BufferedImage's graphics object
      private void drawGoal(java.awt.Graphics g, int x, double angle)
      Draws the goal/portal onto the 3D plane, similarly to the way that the walls are drawn (it's pretty much a small wall)
      private void drawWall(java.awt.Graphics g, double dist, int x, double angle, Actor actor)
      Draws a line that corresponds with relative height of the wall that intercepted the cast ray, and draws that line onto the screen.
      private double rayCast(double x, double y, double angle, int i, java.awt.Graphics g)
      Casts a ray and measures the distance between where the ray was casted and any walls that it intersects, returning that value
      protected void setMap(int[][] map, Portal goal)
      Sets new map for Camera; used when new map is generated by Game

    • Method Detail

      • draw

        protected void draw()
        Main draw loop method that draws either the 2D/3D map based off of variables, or draws nothing if the title screen is currently shown

      • draw2D

        private void draw2D(java.awt.Graphics g,
                    Actor actor)
        Draws the 2D map onto the BufferedImage's graphics object
        Parameters:
        g - - Graphics object that coincides with the BufferedImage
        actor - - Actor currently running maze

      • draw3D

        private void draw3D(java.awt.Graphics g,
                    Actor actor)
        Draws the 3D world for the player onto the BufferedImage's graphics object
        Parameters:
        g - - graphics object of the BufferedImage
        actor - - Actor currently running maze

      • rayCast

        private double rayCast(double x,
                       double y,
                       double angle,
                       int i,
                       java.awt.Graphics g)
        Casts a ray and measures the distance between where the ray was casted and any walls that it intersects, returning that value
        Parameters:
        x - - X-position of player
        y - - Y-position of player
        angle - - angle of cast ray, relative to player's facing angle
        i - - current location in loop/which pixel column to draw to
        g - - graphics object of BufferedImage
        Returns:
        - distance between cast ray and nearest wall

      • drawWall

        private void drawWall(java.awt.Graphics g,
                      double dist,
                      int x,
                      double angle,
                      Actor actor)
        Draws a line that corresponds with relative height of the wall that intercepted the cast ray, and draws that line onto the screen. After all pixel columns are filled, a pseudo-3d image is created
        Parameters:
        g - - Graphics object of BufferedImage
        dist - - distance calculated between cast ray and wall
        x - - X-coordinates where to draw line on Graphics object
        angle - - angle at which the ray was cast
        actor - - Actor currently running maze

      • drawGoal

        private void drawGoal(java.awt.Graphics g,
                      int x,
                      double angle)
        Draws the goal/portal onto the 3D plane, similarly to the way that the walls are drawn (it's pretty much a small wall)
        Parameters:
        g - - Graphics object of BufferedImage
        x - - X-coordinate corresponding with line column to draw
        angle - - relative angle of ray cast

      • setMap

        protected void setMap(int[][] map,
                      Portal goal)
        Sets new map for Camera; used when new map is generated by Game
        Parameters:
        map - - new Map object
        goal - - new goal located within map
